text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) HKUDS/nanobot | 97% | stars now 18096 → est 32591 (range 32514-32668)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/nanobot
2) sipeed/picoclaw | 95% | stars now 4930 → est 10271 (range 10238-10304)
   https://github.com/sipeed/picoclaw
3) qwibitai/nanoclaw | 94% | stars now 7797 → est 13670 (range 13616-13724)
   https://github.com/qwibitai/nanoclaw
4) xyzeva/k-id-age-verifier | 94% | stars now 1175 → est 8244 (range 8219-8269)
   https://github.com/xyzeva/k-id-age-verifier
5) PeonPing/peon-ping | 94% | stars now 1537 → est 5857 (range 5832-5882)
   https://github.com/PeonPing/peon-ping

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
